statements: DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE amount > 500 AND is_fraudulent = TRUE;
DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE is_fraudulent = true AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND is_fraudulent = TRUE;
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_description LIKE 'Suspicious%' AND transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 500);
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 AND account_type = 'Savings';
